glsa.title: libupnp: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libupnp, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libupnp is a portable, open source, UPnP development kit.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libupnp. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attack could arbitrarily write files to a users file system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libupnp users should upgrade to the latest version:
